Dear Hagop ,

 

I hope you’re well .

Please be advised that CSA is still pending submission and at this stage  based on current responses We have detected that  the controls may not be adequate for a full policy  placement while We still have the duty to test the markets and check if We can initially obtain some level of coverage with restrictions and  most importantly some price indications based on some probable scenarios (i.e  Restricted Cover, another scenario where Full MFA is rolled out with an X amount of deductible and a  level of coverage , and Full security measures in places with full level of cover etc. )

 

The markets We are heavily engaged with and would like to work with are the below (We are talking premiums placed  In USD Billions through Marsh with them  )and We would highly  appreciate if We could obtain your confirmation on the below

In addition , as We have discussed  ,a brief(High level roadmap and Milestones ) about the Risk or Security Improvement measures that Chalhoub Group will be taking in the next 3 years as per what you have mentioned earlier .

 

*	Axis 
*	Canopius
*	Beazley

*	AIG

*	Canopius
*	Beazley
*	Zurich

We can confirm that We will officially discuss with the above carriers only at this stage until further notice.

Never the less , We can discuss about the measurements and forecasted implementation and milestones with the experts after We have our initial discussion with the above mentioned carriers.

 

Thank you in advance for your usual support .

 

 

Best regards,

Kev

Please be advised that CSA is still pending submission and at this stage  based on current responses We have detected that  the controls may not be adequate for a full policy  placement while We still have the duty to test the markets and check if We can initially obtain some level of coverage with restrictions and  most importantly some price indications based on some probable scenarios (i.e  Restricted Cover, another scenario where Full MFA is rolled out with an X amount of deductible and a  level of coverage , and Full security measures in places with full level of cover etc. )

 

The markets We are heavily engaged with and would like to work with are the below (We are talking premiums placed  In USD Billions through Marsh with them  )and We would highly  appreciate if We could obtain your confirmation on the below

In addition , as We have discussed  ,a brief(High level roadmap and Milestones ) about the Risk or Security Improvement measures that Chalhoub Group will be taking in the next 3 years as per what you have mentioned earlier .

 

*	Axis
*	Canopius
*	Beazley
*	Zurich
*	AIG

 

We look forward to hearing from you soon !

 

Kindest regards,

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII -ANZIIF

Dear Hagop ,

 

I hope you’re well .

 

Please be advised that We have  managed to secure 50 % lead terms from a lead and very well rated reinsurer despite some pushback and declinatures  from several carriers due to what they call an “unattractive risk profile “ (Please bear with us about the titling , however , I a sure that you understand the picture and the fact that We have the duty to be absolutely transparent with our clients in all occasions )

 

Looking at formalizing the quote (Two options   USD 5 M. and 10 M. and checking for a USD 10 M. excess market , We would like to kindly obtain the below clarifications from your end .

 

Quote from Risk carriers :

 

 

*	5m records are processed and stored in UK / Europe – why? 

	*	Is the client GDRP compliant? 
	*	What controls are in place to ensure the security of these records ?

*	What serious concerns were raised on the penetration test and vulnerability scans?

	*	what is the roadmap to ensure these are addressed?

*	Only 25% of users have MFA – what is timescale to ensure this is fully rolled out?
*	Please confirm which JV the applicant is involved in and if there is full segmentation from the other party/parties
*	Client selected “yes” to previous incident – confirmation there has not been any previous claims and/or incidents within the last 5 years

 

Unquote .

 

Always at your disposal if you have any questions or comments and We look forward to hearing from you soon !

 

Best regards,

Kev

Dear Hagop ,

 

I hope you’re well .

 

Please be advised that CSA is still pending submission and at this stage  based on current responses We have detected that  the controls may not be adequate for a full policy  placement while We still have the duty to test the markets and check if We can initially obtain some level of coverage with restrictions and  most importantly some price indications based on some probable scenarios (i.e  Restricted Cover, another scenario where Full MFA is rolled out with an X amount of deductible and a  level of coverage , and Full security measures in places with full level of cover etc. )

 

The markets We are heavily engaged with and would like to work with are the below (We are talking premiums placed  In USD Billions through Marsh with them  )and We would highly  appreciate if We could obtain your confirmation on the below

In addition , as We have discussed  ,a brief(High level roadmap and Milestones ) about the Risk or Security Improvement measures that Chalhoub Group will be taking in the next 3 years as per what you have mentioned earlier .

 

*	Axis
*	Canopius
*	Beazley

*	Zurich

*	AIG

 

We look forward to hearing from you soon !

 

Kindest regards,

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII -ANZIIF

Cert. ISO 31000 Enterprise Risk Management

Dear Hagop ,

 

I hope you’re well .

 

Please be advised that CSA is still pending submission and at this stage  based on current responses We have detected that  the controls may not be adequate for a full policy  placement while We still have the duty to test the markets and check if We can initially obtain some level of coverage with restrictions and  most importantly some price indications based on some probable scenarios (i.e  Restricted Cover, another scenario where Full MFA is rolled out with an X amount of deductible and a  level of coverage , and Full security measures in places with full level of cover etc. )

 

The markets We are heavily engaged with and would like to work with are the below (We are talking premiums placed  In USD Billions through Marsh with them  )and We would highly  appreciate if We could obtain your confirmation on the below

In addition , as We have discussed  ,a brief(High level roadmap and Milestones ) about the Risk or Security Improvement measures that Chalhoub Group will be taking in the next 3 years as per what you have mentioned earlier .

 

*	Axis
*	Canopius
*	Beazley
*	Zurich
*	AIG

 

We look forward to hearing from you soon !

 

Kindest regards,

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII -ANZIIF

Cert. ISO 31000 Enterprise Risk Management
